revisionDesc.change: updated ID references, transcription, and page breaks to correspond with images

dateline.name: 431 Stevens Street
Camden New Jersey U S America

body.p: First, thanks, heartfelt thanks, my friend, for your good will & deeds—finding a publisher, &c—I wish to know specifically whether Mr Bogue will take the Leaves & is content to be the London publisher in permanence as far as can be told at present. Please send me a circular of his publications—(you may show him this letter)—As far as I am concerned, I shall leave the matter entirely to you. If you think him the proper man & he is willing to take the book let him & his place—if Osgood & Co. say so—be the settled London publication office & depository
